dayalog telikom, guwan gaman atharathura amathum labaganima sandaha pahasukam salasime purogami karyabharaya itukota atha.ee sandaha eeromobayil samaga ekwa kalapaya thula pa්rathama warata mema sewawa labadima sandaha katayuthu sampadanaya kara atha.2008 marthu masa eeromobayil samaga ekwu emirets eeromobayil sewa bhawitha karanu labana pa්rathama wanija guwan sewaya bawata wiya.eeromobayil jiesem paddhathin sahitha guwan yana thuladi dayalog jangama durakathana magin amathum saha esemes pahasukam labaganime hakiyawa dan dayalog pera gewum ha pasu gewum romin paribhogikayan wetha himiwe.eksath rajadhaniyehi sthapitha samagamak wana eeromobayil magin wasara 2008 aga bhagaya wana wita guwan sewa samagam rasakata ayath guwan yana wishala sankhyawak wetha jiesem paddhathin labadimata niyamithaya.danata samagama magin jathyanthara guwan yana 300 kata adhika sankhyawak wetha mema sewawa sapayanu labe.

mogan saha pitarsan athara 3wani kadulla sandaha goda nagu lakunu 83ka sambandhathawa binda damimata lasith malinga samathwiya.pitarsan saha rawi bopara yana dedenagema kadulu binda damimata sanath jayasuriya samath wiya.jayasuriya lakunu 18kata kadulu 2k dawalu athara malinga lakunu 15kata kadulu 2k da suranga lakmal lakunu 26kata kadulu 2k da binda damuha.mahela jayawardhana tharagaye wiraya sammanaya dina gaththeya.engalanthaya 136/9 (oowara 20) oyin mogan 47, kewin pitarsan 41 (lasith malinga 15/2, sanath jayasuriya 18/2, suranga lakmal 26/2)shri lankawa - 137/1 (oowara 17.2) mahela jayawardhana (nodawi) 72, kumar sangakkara (nodawi) 43.
